name: Watchtower
description:
Defend your tower from a wave of oncoming enemies.  Time moves when you move.  When you run out of ammo, you will teleport into an enemy.  Dodge your own bullets and use your melee attacks until your ammo refills.   Defeat all the enemies and you win!
  • WASD - Move/Advance Time
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot/Melee Attack
  • Shift - Zoom In
  • Q - Return to Tower
  • R - Restart the Game

A short prototype made for a weekly game jam with the theme "You Are the Enemy." Inspired by Superhot's bullet time mechanic.

Music: Charles Griffes - The Lake at Evening

Made by Granger Willson, playtested by Adam Hagopian-Zirkel and Elijah Kaplan.
